mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_card (user_id, goods_id, num, updatetime) VALUES (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id 'cardId', g.id'goodsId', c.num'num', p.img_url'imgUrl', b.name 'brandName', p.name 'productionName',g.color_name 'colorName', g.color_code 'colorCode', g.price 'price', g.status 'status', c.updatetime'updateTime' FROM tb_card c LEFT JOIN tb_goods g ON c.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN tb_production p ON g.production_id = p.id LEFT JOIN tb_brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
